title: 505. Did Domestic Violence Really Spike During the Pandemic?
description: When the world went into lockdown, experts predicted a rise in intimate-partner assaults. What actually happened was more complicated.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: When the world went into lockdown, experts predicted a rise in intimate-partner assaults. What actually happened was more complicated.
